content: 4 22 half_double_crochet 16 chain 1 space 1 chain 2 space row 9 repeat row 5 42 half_double_crochet 1 chain 2 space repeat row 6-9 10 more times repeat row 2 one more time then start edging market day shawlette edging and ties row 1 ch1 and turn skip 2 3 double_crochet chain 3 slip_stitch into top two front bars of the 3rd double_crochet 3 double_crochet in same st skip 2 single_crochet in next st repeat until you have 3 st before the chain 2 space from the row below 3 double_crochet chain 3 slip_stitch into top two front bars of the 3rd double_crochet 3 double_crochet in same st skip 2 single_crochet in next st then repeat to to the end finishing with a single_crochet note- you will probably need to skip just one stitch instead of 2 for the last repeat 35 triangle picots - 17 on either side 1 in the chain 2 space chain 1 and turn to single_crochet crochet across the top edge place stitches evenly approximately 78-79 st on either side of the magic_ring or 156-158 sts total or whatever your gauge requires to prevent curling slip_stitch to finish finishing weave in ends wash and block play with this pattern try a different weight of yarn with a corresponding hook use different colors to stripe share your work ii d love to see your completed shawlette feel free to use the hashtags #marketdayshawlette and #ewapattern and tag me on instagram @everyday with ashley copyright 2023 by ashley beals please respect my copyright and do not share duplicate or sell this pattern without my permission thank you for knitting my design
